mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shipping (shippingstatus_id, shipping_recipientln, shipping_recipientfn, shipping_tel, shipping_addr, shipping_addrdetail, shipping_postcode, shipping_request) VALUES (#{shippingstatusId}, #{shippingRecipientln}, #{shippingRecipientfn}, #{shippingTel}, #{shippingAddr}, #{shippingAddrdetail}, #{shippingPostcode}, #{shippingRequest})
